### Installing R
Download and install the following depending on your operating system:

- <a href="https://cran.r-project.org/bin/windows/base/" target="_blank">Windows: https://cran.r-project.org/bin/windows/base/</a>
- <a href="https://cran.r-project.org/bin/macosx/" target="_blank">Mac:  and select the R-x.x.x.pkg notarized and signed option</a>
